name: villainess
content:

a female character in a book, play, film, etc. who harms other people: She steals the show as the bewitching yet hateful villainess. The animators created the memorable images of the villainesses of traditional folk tales.
a woman who is considered bad, harmful, or dangerous: When they separated, she was portrayed as the selfish villainess, and her husband as the innocent party.
